丸毎: (まるごと) - in its entirety; whole; wholly
丸洗い: (まるあらい) - washing a kimono (or futon, etc.) without taking it apart; laundering whole
丸漢フォント: (まるかんフォント) - Marukan font
丸潰れ: (まるつぶれ) - complete ruin/collapse; losing (something) completely (e.g. face)
丸焼き: (まるやき) - whole roast (e.g. pig, turkey, etc.)
丸焼け: (まるやけ) - total fire loss; completely burned
丸焼けになった: (まるやけになった) - completely burned
丸煮: (まるに) - boiling something whole (e.g. vegetable, fish); cooking something whole
丸秘: (まるひ) - (refers to the 秘 in a red circle) confidential; secret; classified
丸窓: (まるまど) - circular window; round window
丸簾貝: (マルスダレガイ) - embossed venus (species of venus clam, Venus toreuma)
丸耳象: (マルミミゾウ) - African forest elephant (Loxodonta cyclotis)
丸聞こえ: (まるぎこえ) - being able to hear everything (esp. when one was not intended to)
丸葉朝顔: (マルバアサガオ) - common morning glory (Ipomoea purpurea)
丸葉萩: (マルバハギ) - leafy lespedeza (species of bush clover, Lespedeza cyrtobotrya)
丸葉青だも: (マルバアオダモ) - Japanese flowering ash (Fraxinus sieboldiana)
丸行灯: (まるあんどん) - cylindrical paper lantern
丸裸: (まるはだか) - nude; utterly stark naked; wearing only one's birthday suit
丸裸にする: (まるはだかにする) - to strip a person of all his or her clothes
丸裸になる: (まるはだかになる) - to be stripped of all one's clothes; to lose everything one has
丸襟: (まるえり) - round collar (of Western clothing)
丸見え: (まるみえ) - full view; plain sight; completely visible
丸覚え: (まるおぼえ) - full memorization; full memorisation
丸鋸: (まるのこ) - circular saw; buzz saw
丸青目鱛: (マルアオメエソ) - Chlorophthalmus borealis (species of greeneye)
丸顔: (まるがお) - round face; moon face
丸飲み: (まるのみ) - swallowing whole/swallowing without chewing; taking something in without fully understanding it; accepting without reservation/accepting something as-is
丸髷: (まるわげ) - traditional married woman's hair style, with an oval chignon on top; men's hairstyle (Edo period)
丸齧り: (まるかじり) - biting into a whole fruit (esp. apple)
丸Ｃ: (まるシー) - copyright symbol/copyright sign; copyright
丹: (tan) - cinnabar , red earth (ou seja, contendo cinábrio ou minium), vermilion
丹前風呂: (たんぜんぶろ) - famous bathhouse with prostitutes from the early Edo period
丹念: (tannen) - minucioso, cuidadoso, meticuloso, escrupuloso, detalhado, elaborado
丹波海苔: (タンバノリ) - Grateloupia elliptica (species of red alga)
丹田: (たんでん) - point below the navel (a focus point for internal meditative techniques)
丹精: (tansei) - trabalhando com afinco, sinceridade, diligência, esforço, empenho
丹精を込める: (たんせいをこめる) - to take pains (doing something); to take great care
丹誠: (たんせい) - working earnestly; sincerity; diligence; effort; pains
丹青: (たんぜい) - (たんせい only) red and blue; (たんせい only) paints/colors; painting/picture
丹頂: (タンチョウ) - red-crowned crane; Japanese crane (Grus japonensis)
丹頂鶴: (タンチョウヅル) - red-crowned crane; Japanese crane (Grus japonensis)
主あど: (おもあど) - main secondary or supporting role (in kyogen)
主とする: (おもとする) - (usu. 〜を主とする) mostly involve; principally involve
主の御名: (しゅのみな) - the Lord's name (esp. in Christianity)
主の日: (しゅのひ) - the Sabbath; the Lord's Day
主の晩餐: (しゅのばんさん) - the Lord's Supper
主の祈り: (しゅのいのり) - the Lord's Prayer
主の箱: (しゅのはこ) - Ark of the Lord
主を取る: (しゅうをとる) - to find a new master
主ページ: (しゅページ) - homepage; main page (of a website)
主メモリ: (しゅメモリ) - main storage; main memory
主レコードキー: (しゅレコードキー) - prime record key
主人: (しゅじん) - head (of a household)/proprietor (of a store)/proprietress/landlord/landlady; one's husband; (one's) employer/(one's) master; host/hostess
主人に仕える: (しゅじんにつかえる) - to serve a master; to serve one's employer faithfully
